.TH LOWERCMD 1
.SH NAME
lowercmd \- lowercase synopsis placeholders
.SH SYNOPSIS
.\" NOTE: The bracketing here ([source] optional, dest required) intentionally
.\" differs from man-lowercase-rendered.txt (source required, [dest] optional)
.\" to verify that each parser independently handles required/optional markers.
lowercmd [source] dest <config_file> [extra...]
.SH OPTIONS
.TP
--verbose
enable verbose output
